Aug. 3, 2014 D National Eisteddfod of Wales (Championship/First Section)
National Eisteddfod of Wales (Championship Section) 1 Entertainments Contest National Eisteddfod of Wales national-eisteddfod-wales-championship-section
Festival Fields, Millennium Coastal Park, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Own choice of music no longer than 20 minutes with a minimum of three items.
Prizes: 1. Cwpan Tiriogaeth Sir y Fflint to be held for a year and £750 (Ymddiriedolaeth James Pantyfedwen) 2. £450 (Cyngor Cymuned Llandybïe) 3. £300 (Cymdeithas Cymrodorion Porth Tywyn a Phenbre)
Sponsored by TAD Builders Ltd.
July 11, 2014, 8:06 a.m. July 11, 2014, 9:19 a.m.
1 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
2 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter
3 Deiniolen Band Lois Eifion Jones
4 Markham and District Band Gareth Pritchard
5 Llanrug Band Paul Hughes
